full_summary:
# Tender Opportunity: Solutions-Based Professional Services (TSPS)

## Overview of the Tender

The Library and Archives Canada (LAC) is issuing a tender for Solutions-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support the Real Property Branch (RPB) in managing real property financial resources and implementing changes.

## Description of the Requirement

The successful contractor will assist LAC in analyzing business objectives, reviewing current practices, and recommending solutions to address identified gaps and challenges. The contractor must hold a valid facility security clearance at the level of secret and ensure that personnel requiring access to protected information hold a valid personnel security screening.

## Eligibility and Selection Criteria

The tender is open to Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under E60ZT-16TSSB who qualify under Tier 1, subcontractor level, and meet the specified consultant category, security level, region, and level of expertise for Stream 4: Real property project management services. The selection criteria will be based on a combination of technical merit and price.

## Important Dates and Deadlines

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-10T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-20
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-29

## Trade Agreements and Regulations

The tender is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

## Contact Information

Cristel St-Louis
Email: [cristel.st-louis@bac-lac.gc.ca](mailto:cristel.st-louis@bac-lac.gc.ca)
Phone: (873) 455-6334

## Additional Resources

The tender notice and supporting documents are available on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

Note to the reader:

As the original text was quite extensive and included information that was not directly related to the main topic of the tender, I have left out unnecessary details and focused on providing the essential information. The rewritten text aims to make the content easy to read and understand.
